original_title: Underworld figure ‘Manna Roshan’ and accomplice found shot dead
original_body_lines: The bodies of two persons who were shot to death have been recovered from a vacant land at Tunnana in Padukka, police said.
The two bodies recovered at Tunnana have been identified as those of underworld figure Don Indika alias ‘Manna Roshan’ and his accomplice.
The police suspect that the duo were killed during a clash between two rival underworld gangs.
